Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

name: Prying Blade
rulesTexts:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Favorable Winds
rulesTexts: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

name: Dusk Legion Dreadnought
rulesTexts:
Vigilance
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Tishana's Wayfinder
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Territorial Hammerskull
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.

name: Sheltering Light
rulesTexts: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)

name: Firecannon Blast
rulesTexts:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.

name: Ixalli's Diviner
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Tilonalli's Knight
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Shadowed Caravel
rulesTexts:
Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on this Vehicle.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Dive Down
rulesTexts: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Growing Rites of Itlimoc // Itlimoc, Cradle of the Sun
rulesTexts:
When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more creatures, transform Growing Rites of Itlimoc.

(Transforms from Growing Rites of Itlimoc.)
{T}: Add {G}.
{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

name: Pirate's Cutlass
rulesTexts:
When this Equipment enters, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Rootbound Crag
rulesTexts:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Jace, Cunning Castaway
rulesTexts:
+1: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.
−2: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this token becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it."
−5: Create two tokens that are copies of Jace, except they're not legendary.

name: Skulduggery
rulesTexts: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.

name: Repeating Barrage
rulesTexts:
Repeating Barrage deals 3 damage to any target.
Raid — {3}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you attacked this turn.

name: Duskborne Skymarcher
rulesTexts:
Flying
{W}, {T}: Target attacking Vampire gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Blinding Fog
rulesTexts: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Vraska's Contempt
rulesTexts: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

name: Rowdy Crew
rulesTexts:
Trample
When this creature enters, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on this creature.

name: Jungle Delver
rulesTexts: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Arcane Adaptation
rulesTexts:
As this enchantment enters, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

name: Treasure Map // Treasure Cove
rulesTexts: {1}, {T}: Scry 1. Put a landmark counter on this artifact. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, remove those counters, transform this artifact, and create three Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

(Transforms from Treasure Map.)
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

name: Vona, Butcher of Magan
rulesTexts:
Vigilance, lifelink
{T}, Pay 7 life: Destroy target nonland permanent. Activate only during your turn.

name: Otepec Huntmaster
rulesTexts:
Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Target Dinosaur gains haste until end of turn.

name: Bellowing Aegisaur
rulesTexts: Enrage — Whenever this creature is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

name: Costly Plunder
rulesTexts:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards.

name: Vineshaper Mystic
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target Merfolk you control.

name: Arguel's Blood Fast // Temple of Aclazotz
rulesTexts:
{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you may transform Arguel's Blood Fast.

(Transforms from Arguel's Blood Fast.)
{T}: Add {B}.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

name: Heartless Pillage
rulesTexts:
Target opponent discards two cards.
Raid — If you attacked this turn, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Captivating Crew
rulesTexts: {3}{R}: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Perilous Voyage
rulesTexts: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 2 or less, scry 2.

name: Spreading Rot
rulesTexts: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.

name: Savage Stomp
rulesTexts:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a Dinosaur you control.
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

name: Glacial Fortress
rulesTexts:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

name: Cancel
rulesTexts: Counter target spell.

name: Rallying Roar
rulesTexts: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap them.

name: Contract Killing
rulesTexts: Destroy target creature. Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Deadeye Tormentor
rulesTexts: Raid — When this creature enters, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.

name: Demolish
rulesTexts: Destroy target artifact or land.

name: Primal Amulet // Primal Wellspring
rulesTexts:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on this artifact. Then if there are four or more charge counters on it, you may remove those counters and transform it.

(Transforms from Primal Amulet.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color. When that mana is spent to cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Charging Monstrosaur
rulesTexts: Trample, haste

name: Regisaur Alpha
rulesTexts:
Other Dinosaurs you control have haste.
When this creature enters, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

name: Field of Ruin
rulesTexts:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

name: Bishop's Soldier
rulesTexts: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

name: Commune with Dinosaurs
rulesTexts: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Dire Fleet Interloper
rulesTexts:
Menace
When this creature enters, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: River Heralds' Boon
rulesTexts: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.

name: Seekers' Squire
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Demystify
rulesTexts: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Vanquish the Weak
rulesTexts: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.

name: Ixalli's Keeper
rulesTexts: {7}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Hostage Taker
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, exile another target creature or artifact until this creature leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

name: Deeproot Champion
rulesTexts: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Navigator's Ruin
rulesTexts: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent mills four cards.

name: Lightning-Rig Crew
rulesTexts:
{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Pirate spell, untap this creature.

name: Rigging Runner
rulesTexts:
First strike
Raid — This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.

name: Queen's Commission
rulesTexts: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

name: Angrath's Marauders
rulesTexts: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

name: Lightning Strike
rulesTexts: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Emperor's Vanguard
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Legion Conquistador
rulesTexts: When this creature enters, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Lookout's Dispersal
rulesTexts:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Pirate.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}.

name: Kitesail Freebooter
rulesTexts:
Flying
When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until this creature leaves the battlefield.

name: Overflowing Insight
rulesTexts: Target player draws seven cards.

name: Call to the Feast
rulesTexts: Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
rulesTexts: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

name: Storm Fleet Spy
rulesTexts: Raid — When this creature enters, if you attacked this turn, draw a card.

name: Pillar of Origins
rulesTexts:
As this artifact enters, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

name: Sanguine Sacrament
rulesTexts: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.

name: Trove of Temptation
rulesTexts:
Each opponent must attack you or a planeswalker you control with at least one creature each combat if able.
At the beginning of your end step, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Raiders' Wake
rulesTexts:
Whenever an opponent discards a card, that player loses 2 life.
Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.

name: River's Rebuke
rulesTexts: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

name: Unclaimed Territory
rulesTexts:
As this land enters, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.
